metadata.synopsis: Final Emperor AD when players reach their Lair.
metadata.how_to_trigger: When players entered in the following trigger: S_LOW_Elfsong_Basement_EmperorLair_ab5deea7-35fc-46dd-a908-745f94f6c07c

0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
0.text: My old home - thank you for bringing me back. Look around - you'll find some of my things still intact. Perhaps even useful to you.
